name: Reconnect (itch) (Morpheyz, Schmalex, thejan14)
description:
5G on earth broke down! Nobody can communicate anymore and your were sent up to space to fix the satellite. Collect scrap, bring it back to your ship and see your score go up!

How to play
  • Collect space scrap and bring it back to your ship to add it to your score.
  • Be aware of your oxygen bar at the top! Reconnect to your ship when you're in range to restore it. 
Controls

W - Accelerate forward

A D - Rotate left and right.

SPACE - Connect to / Disconnect from your ship

Press space when you're close to your spaceship to connect your tether. The arrow around your astronaut will turn green when you are in range.

Hints
  • Don't forget to check how many tethers you have left. Use your last tether to lock in your score!
  • If you can't start the game on Windows, run the "Compatibility troubleshooter" on the .exe file: Right-click on the file -> Compatibility -> "Run compatibility troubleshooter"
